Hero.description: I help founders, partners, and businesses resolve high-stakes disputes and prevent escalation — with clear strategy and decisive execution.
Hero.headline: Resolve critical business disputes — with clarity, strategy, and decisive resolution.
Hero.subheadline: I help founders, partners, and businesses resolve high-stakes disputes and prevent escalation — with clear strategy and decisive execution.
Hero.whoIHelp: Founders • Partners • Family businesses • Investors • Cross-border operators

About.title: About Khaled Aun
About.description: Disputes destroy value, relationships, and focus. My role is to end them decisively — or prevent them entirely.
About.experience: I bring clarity to chaotic situations. When founders clash, partnerships fracture, or deals go wrong, I help my clients see the full picture, understand their leverage, and execute a strategy that protects what matters most.
About.philosophy: Most business disputes don't need to go to court. They need someone who can diagnose the real problem, map the risks, and negotiate from strength. When litigation is necessary, I bring a commercial litigation background and the strategic discipline to see it through.
About.whatImNot: I don't sell volume legal work. I take on matters where judgment and strategy materially change the outcome.
About.disputeStrategyDesc: High-stakes commercial disputes with clarity and precision
About.arbitrationDesc: Alternative dispute resolution for cross-border matters
About.crossBorderDesc: International commercial strategy and risk reduction
About.advisoryMentorshipDesc: Strategic counsel for leaders under pressure
About.expertiseSubtitle: Focused expertise in dispute resolution, governance, and commercial strategy.
About.otherVenturesDesc: I also build travel technology tools as a separate venture.

Services.title: How I Help
Services.subtitle: I work with business owners, founders, and partners facing high-stakes disputes or governance challenges.
Services.disputeStrategyDesc: High-stakes commercial disputes, partner conflicts, shareholder disputes. Negotiation, settlement strategy, litigation steering when necessary.
Services.governanceDesc: Agreements, decision frameworks, partner alignment. Prevent escalation and protect enterprise value before problems arise.
Services.crossBorderDesc: Cross-jurisdiction issues, contracts, enforcement strategy. Practical, business-first risk reduction for international operations.
Services.advisoryDesc: For executives and founders navigating legal pressure and complex disputes. Strategic counsel when the stakes are high.
Services.ctaDescription: Let's discuss your situation and explore how clarity and strategy can change the outcome.

Experience.subtitle: A track record of excellence in legal strategy and business growth across leading technology companies.

Footer.description: Dispute Resolution & Governance Counsel. I help founders, partners, and businesses resolve high-stakes disputes and prevent escalation.

Process.title: How I Work
Process.subtitle: A structured approach to resolving disputes and protecting your interests.
Process.step1Desc: Understand the full picture — facts, relationships, leverage points, and potential outcomes.
Process.step2Desc: Develop a clear plan that maximizes your position and minimizes unnecessary exposure.
Process.step3Desc: Execute through precise communication, negotiation, and escalation management.
Process.step4Desc: Close the matter decisively and put structures in place to prevent recurrence.

SelectedMatters.title: Representative Experience
SelectedMatters.subtitle: Selected examples of the types of matters I handle.
SelectedMatters.matter1: Represented parties in complex commercial disputes involving contracts, payment claims, and business relationships.
SelectedMatters.matter2: Advised on pre-litigation strategy leading to resolution before trial.
SelectedMatters.matter3: Handled high-pressure negotiations where timing and leverage were critical.
SelectedMatters.matter4: Supported cross-border legal risk decisions for business stakeholders.
SelectedMatters.matter5: Structured governance frameworks for partner-owned businesses to prevent future disputes.
SelectedMatters.matter6: Navigated multi-party conflicts involving founders, investors, and operational partners.
SelectedMatters.disclaimer: Specific details are confidential. These examples represent the types of matters handled.

Credentials.title: Background & Credentials
Credentials.subtitle: Professional foundation in commercial litigation, dispute resolution, and governance.

llb.title: LL.B. in Law
llb.description: Rigorous foundation in commercial, civil, and administrative law — building the analytical framework for complex dispute resolution.

bar.title: Admission to the Israeli Bar Association
bar.description: Licensed attorney authorized to appear before all courts and legal forums. Commercial litigation practice focused on business disputes.

directors.title: Directors Course
directors.institution: The Hebrew University of Jerusalem – School of Business Administration
directors.description: Executive education in corporate governance, strategic decision-making, and board leadership — essential for governance advisory work.

mediation.title: Mediation & Arbitration Certification
mediation.institution: Israel Bar Association – National Mediation Institute
mediation.description: Certified in professional mediation and arbitration practices. Focus on commercial dispute resolution, negotiation, and strategic conflict management.

ciarb.title: CIArb Pathway (In Progress)
ciarb.description: Currently pursuing membership in the Chartered Institute of Arbitrators to deepen expertise in international arbitration and ADR.
